relapse.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to become ill again after you have seemed to improve
relapse.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: We were afraid he might relapse into a coma.
relapse.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to start to behave badly again
relapse.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: Clara soon relapsed into her old ways.
relapse.translation[1].definitions[0].de: when someone becomes ill again after having seemed to improve
relapse.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: She had a relapse and died soon after.
relapse.translation[2].definitions[0].de: to start to get worse again after things had seemed to improve
relapse.translation[2].definitions[0].ex: The U.S., after a brief recovery mid-year, is relapsing into a second slump.
